mapper.select: SELECT * FROM comment WHERE gubun = #{gubun} and fk_id = #{fkId} ORDER BY reg_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(gubun, fk_id, level, parent_id, writer, content, reg_date) VALUES(#{gubun}, #{fkId}, #{level}, #{parentId}, #{writer}, #{content}, utc_timestamp)
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET writer = #{writer}, content = #{content}, mod_date = utc_timestamp WHERE gubun = #{gubun} and fk_id = #{fkId} and c_id = #{cid}
